Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/St Lawrence
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana, 134th, Langley and 131st: due to, street blockage near 130th/St Lawrence.
